title: Treatment of 2,4,6-tribromophenol-contaminated water using iron ion/calcium sulfite: the dual role of oxidation and coagulation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2491-2499
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00441H, Paper
Fan Bai, Ye Liu, Yujie Cheng, Yingqing Guo, Zhenbin Chen, Lisan Cao, Zongping Wang, Pengchao Xie
TBP can be oxidized in the Fe(III)/CaSO3 system, and the in situ formed iron species and CaSO4 act as coagulant nuclei, benefiting the coagulation process.
